price: Kuma idan sun jũya, to, ku sani cẽwa lalle Allah ne Majiɓincinku: Mãdalla da Majiɓinci, kuma mãdalla da Mai taimako, Shĩ.
arabic: وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tawallaw fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha mawlākum niʿ'ma al-mawlā waniʿ'ma al-naṣīru
